Fwd: ITI comments on the first public draft of “Applying WCAG to Non-Web ICT”
The WCAG2ICT fails to execute on the announced purpose.
WCAG2ICT comment: deal with accessible non-web software against usability in general, take purpose & usage context into account
WCAG2ICT comment: don't deal with content/documents and software at once - split the WCAG2ICT document into two
WCAG2ICT comment: how can guidelines be applied to something that is not even defined
WCAG2ICT comment: WCAG2ICT fails to distinguish between platform and application software and does not acknowledge their specific roles and relationshipt to each other
WCAG2ICT comment: what does WCAG2ICT offer that ISO 9241-171 (and other standards) fails to offer?
WCAG2ICT comment: What is the relation to "Inventory of Accessibility and Accessibility-related Standards and Specifications" by JTC 1 SWG-A
WCAG2ICT comment: why even consider a hammer as a tool for screws?
WCAG2ICT comment: why no acknowledgement of MSAA, IAccessible2, iOS VoiceOver, ... etc.
